mapper.insert: insert into parent (parent_id, parent_name, parent_resgister, parent_tel, parent_audition_order, parent_audition_finish, first_paid_date_time) values (#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentResgister,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{parentTel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentAuditionOrder,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{parentAuditionFinish,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{firstPaidDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into parent
parent_id,
parent_name,
parent_resgister,
parent_tel,
parent_audition_order,
parent_audition_finish,
first_paid_date_time,
#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentResgister,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{parentTel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{parentAuditionOrder,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{parentAuditionFinish,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{firstPaidDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select: select parent_audition_order theDate, count(*) shuLiang from parent group by day(parent_audition_order);
select parent_resgister theDate, count(*) shuLiang from parent where parent_resgister between #{start_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{end_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by day(parent_resgister)

select parent_audition_order theDate, count(*) shuLiang from parent where parent_resgister between #{start_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{end_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by day(parent_audition_order);

select parent_audition_finish theDate, count(*) shuLiang from parent where parent_resgister between #{start_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{end_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by day(parent_audition_finish);

select first_paid_date_time theDate, count(*) shuLiang from parent where parent_resgister between #{start_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{end_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by day(first_paid_date_time);
